bill_title: Honoring and congratulating Mr. Melvin (Joe) Shaw on his 100th birthday.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring and congratulating Mr. Melvin (Joe) Shaw on his 100th birthday. WHEREAS, Mr. Shaw has been a proud South Dakotan and resident of Legislative District 23 in Gettysburg; and WHEREAS, Mr. Shaw has been a loving family man, with one son Harlen, two grandsons Rick and David, and two great grandchildren Samantha and Spencer; and WHEREAS, Mr. Shaw was born the same year as our State Capitol and the Potter County Court House were built: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that we honor and congratulate Mr. Melvin (Joe) Shaw on his 100th birthday.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring and congratulating Mr. Melvin (Joe) Shaw on his 100th birthday. WHEREAS, Mr. Shaw has been a proud South Dakotan and resident of Legislative District 23 in Gettysburg; and WHEREAS, Mr. Shaw has been a loving family man, with one son Harlen, two grandsons Rick and David, and two great grandchildren Samantha and Spencer; and WHEREAS, Mr. Shaw was born the same year as our State Capitol and the Potter County Court House were built: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that we honor and congratulate Mr. Melvin (Joe) Shaw on his 100th birthday. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
